appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appShortName.description: The short title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Manchmal ist es schön ein schwebendes browser Fenster offen zu haben. Mit dem schwebenden Browser Fenster ist das möglich!
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

appLabelUrl.description: The text of label-element of URL field on the options page.

appLabelImproveByTracking.description: The text of label-element of tracking field on the options page.

appLabelMinimize.description: The text of tooltop of the minimize button.

appLabelBrowser.description: The text of tooltop of the browser button.

appLabelSettings.description: The text of tooltop of the settings button.

appLabelClose.description: The text of tooltop of the close button.

appPlaceholderUrl.message: Vollständige URL eingeben beginnend mit http(s)://
appPlaceholderUrl.description: The label of the URL field on the options page.

appLabelSave.description: The label of save button on the options page.

appAlertSomethingWrong.description: The text shown when something goes wrong.

appTxtSettings.description: The title of the options page.

appTxtOptions.description: The title of the options area on the options page.

appTxtKeyboardShortcuts.description: The title of the Keyboard shortcuts area on the options page.

appTxtKeyboardShortcutsFromEverywhere.description: The title of the Keyboard shortcuts area 'for everywhere' on the options page.

appTxtSwitchBetweenWebWindowAndThisSetti.message: Zwischen Web Ansicht und diesen Einstellungen wechseln
appTxtSwitchBetweenWebWindowAndThisSetti.description: The describing text of specific keyboard shortcut.

appTxtCloseAllWindows.description: The describing text of specific keyboard shortcut.

appTxtOpenThisSettingsWindow.description: The describing text of specific keyboard shortcut.

appTxtKeyboardShortcutsFromWebWindow.description: The title of the Keyboard shortcuts area 'for web window' on the options page.

appTxtReloadThePage.description: The describing text of specific keyboard shortcut.

appTxtFullscreen.description: The describing text of specific keyboard shortcut.

appTxtVisitProjectWebsite.description: The text for the link to Github in credits area.

appTxtIssues.description: The text for the link to issues in credits area.

appTxtIconsDesignedBy.description: The text to credit the icon designer.

appMiscYouAreAmazing.message: Du bist klasse! Dank dir wird die App jedes mal ein bisschen besser!
appMiscYouAreAmazing.description: Text shown in console when user enables tracking.

appMiscConsiderTracking.message: Überlege Tracking einzuschalten. Ich nutze es um die App zu verbessern. Dank Tracking kann ich sehen welche Fehler auftreten, ohne dass du sie übermitteln musst. Die App wird NIEMALS persönliche Informationen sammeln.
appMiscConsiderTracking.description: Text shown in console when user disables tracking.
